Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: NVDIMM %1 encountered an error that may have caused data loss.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UnsafeShutdownCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BaselineUnsafeShutdownCount" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: NVDIMM %1 notified the driver that its health state changed. See the Details tab for more information.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LostDataPersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalError" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostDataPersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalErrorImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: The driver could not confirm that the NVDIMM %1 is healthy. To protect your data, the NVDIMM is now in read-only mode. Consider backing up your data to another disk.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NtStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: NVDIMM %1 encountered a serious problem. All data that was saved to this NVDIMM may be lost when the computer shuts down or restarts. Consider backing up your data to another disk.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LostDataPersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalError" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostDataPersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalErrorImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: The problem with NVDIMM %1 was resolved. Data that was saved to this NVDIMM will not be lost when the computer shuts down or restarts.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LostDataPersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalError" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostDataPersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalErrorImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: NVDIMM %1 encountered a serious problem. Data that was recently saved to this NVDIMM may be lost when the computer shuts down or restarts. Consider backing up your data to another disk.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LostDataPersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalError" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostDataPersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalErrorImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: The problem with NVDIMM %1 was resolved. Data that was saved to this NVDIMM will not be lost when the computer shuts down or restarts.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LostDataPersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalError" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostDataPersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalErrorImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: NVDIMM %1 encountered a critical problem. Windows may not be able to read or write to this NVDIMM.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LostDataPersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalError" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostDataPersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalErrorImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: The critical problem with NVDIMM %1 was resolved.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LostDataPersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalError" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostDataPersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalErrorImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: NVDIMM %1 is in a degraded health state and may soon encounter serious problems. Consider backing up your data to another disk. Use the Get-PhysicalDisk command to see more information.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="NfitHandle" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LostDataPersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistence" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalError" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostDataPersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="LostWritePersistenceImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="FatalErrorImminent" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Message" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
